sentences.en: Both formations provide instructive early examples of integration.
sentences.cn: 两者的成立提供了一体化的有益的先例.

sentences.en: He went on record as advocating immediate integration.
sentences.cn: 他公开提倡立即取消种族隔离.

sentences.en: Integration of management and other disciplines would then not be difficult.
sentences.cn: 这样,把管理学同其他学科结合起来就不困难了.

sentences.en: Lots of people in Chicago don'tsee that racial border. They see progress towards integration.
sentences.cn: 在芝加哥很多人看不到那条种族边界。他们看到的是朝向种族融合的进步。

sentences.en: Steps toward integration were quickened in World War II.
sentences.cn: 二次大战时,同化的步骤是加紧了.

sentences.en: The aim is to promote closer economic integration.
sentences.cn: 目的是进一步促进经济一体化。
这种综合当然是不严密的.

sentences.en: The integration of fat and carbohydrate metabolism is of great importance in the heart.
sentences.cn: 心脏中脂肪和糖代谢的整合也是很重要的.

sentences.en: The operation that is the inverse of differentiation is called integration.
sentences.cn: 与微分相反的运算叫做积分.

sentences.en: This was the greatest event in the annals of European integration.
sentences.cn: 这是欧洲统一史上最重大的事件.

sentences.en: Total load was then obtained by graphical or numerical integration.
sentences.cn: 然后,通过图解积分或数值积分可求得总载荷.

sentences.en: Trade integration is part of the larger spectrum of types of economic integration.
sentences.cn: 贸易一体化是范围较大的各种经济一体化的一部分.

sentences.en: We are working to bring about closer political integration in the EU.
sentences.cn: 我们正在努力实现欧盟內部更加紧密的政治一体化.

sentences.en: We can usefully distinguish between four main kinds of international economic integration.
sentences.cn: 我们可以区分四种主要的国际经济一体化.

sentences.en: With Germany, France has been the prime mover behind closer European integration.
sentences.cn: 法国与德国一道，一直是更加紧密的欧洲一体化进程的主要推动者。

words.tran_cn: 综合的；完整的；互相协调的
主张取消种族隔离的人
[自] 积分器；[电子] 积分电路；整合之人
整合；使…成整体（integrate的过去分词）
求积分；取消隔离；成为一体
使…完整；使…成整体；求…的积分；表示…的总和

phrases.tran_cn: 部分积分法，分步积分法
（纺织品与服装、农产品）一体化进程
集成测试；整合测试；组装测试
垂直整合；垂直统一管理；纵向结合

trans.tran_cn: 结合，整合，一体化，（不同肤色、种族、宗教信仰等的人的）混合
trans.tran_en: the combining of two or more things so that they work together effectively
